events.name: Circular value chain (CVC) of spent lithium-ion batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_label: Circular value chain (CVC) of spent lithium-ion batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_description: The handling of end-of-life lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) is crucial due to their high remaining capacity. This review discusses the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs and proposes the 5R principle: reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose, and recycling. It also covers state-of-the-art technologies, key issues, and future challenges for sustainable CVC.
events.description: The handling of end-of-life lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) is crucial due to their high remaining capacity. This review discusses the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs and proposes the 5R principle: reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose, and recycling. It also covers state-of-the-art technologies, key issues, and future challenges for sustainable CVC.

events.name: 5R principle
events.wd_description: The 5R principle includes reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose, and recycling, aimed at extending battery life, conserving natural resources, and protecting the environment.
events.description: The 5R principle includes reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose, and recycling, aimed at extending battery life, conserving natural resources, and protecting the environment.

events.name: Reduce
events.wd_description: Reducing the use of materials in battery production to minimize environmental impact.
events.description: Reducing the use of materials in battery production to minimize environmental impact.

events.name: Redesign
events.wd_description: Redesigning batteries for better efficiency and ease of recycling.
events.description: Redesigning batteries for better efficiency and ease of recycling.

events.name: Remanufacturing
events.wd_description: Remanufacturing involves restoring used batteries to a like-new condition.
events.description: Remanufacturing involves restoring used batteries to a like-new condition.

events.name: Repurpose
events.wd_description: Repurposing batteries for secondary applications after their initial use.
events.description: Repurposing batteries for secondary applications after their initial use.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: Recycling involves processing spent batteries to recover valuable materials.
events.description: Recycling involves processing spent batteries to recover valuable materials.

events.name: Remanufacturing technologies
events.wd_description: State-of-the-art technologies for remanufacturing LIBs, restoring them to a like-new condition, are discussed.
events.description: State-of-the-art technologies for remanufacturing LIBs, restoring them to a like-new condition, are discussed.

events.name: Repurpose process
events.wd_description: A thorough summary of key issues and applications of the repurpose process for spent LIBs.
events.description: A thorough summary of key issues and applications of the repurpose process for spent LIBs.

events.name: Recycling process
events.wd_description: The recycling process for LIBs, including pre-treatments and mainstream recycling technologies, from technical, economic, and regulatory perspectives.
events.description: The recycling process for LIBs, including pre-treatments and mainstream recycling technologies, from technical, economic, and regulatory perspectives.

events.name: Pre-treatments
events.wd_description: Pre-treatment processes are necessary to prepare spent LIBs for recycling.
events.description: Pre-treatment processes are necessary to prepare spent LIBs for recycling.

events.name: Mainstream recycling technologies
events.wd_description: Mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs are analyzed from technical, economic, and regulatory perspectives.
events.description: Mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs are analyzed from technical, economic, and regulatory perspectives.

events.name: Technical perspective
events.wd_description: Technical aspects of mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs.
events.description: Technical aspects of mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs.

events.name: Economic perspective
events.wd_description: Economic viability and considerations of mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs.
events.description: Economic viability and considerations of mainstream recycling technologies for LIBs.

events.name: Regulatory perspective
events.wd_description: Regulatory requirements and frameworks for recycling LIBs.
events.description: Regulatory requirements and frameworks for recycling LIBs.

events.name: Future challenges
events.wd_description: Future challenges and prospects for sustainable circular value chains of spent LIBs.
events.description: Future challenges and prospects for sustainable circular value chains of spent LIBs.

events.name: Advanced technologies
events.wd_description: Advanced technologies like big data, blockchain, and cloud-based services are required to address issues in the LIB circular value chain.
events.description: Advanced technologies like big data, blockchain, and cloud-based services are required to address issues in the LIB circular value chain.

events.name: Big data
events.wd_description: Utilizing big data for improved management and tracking in the LIB circular value chain.
events.description: Utilizing big data for improved management and tracking in the LIB circular value chain.

events.name: Blockchain
events.wd_description: Implementing blockchain technology to enhance transparency and security in the LIB circular value chain.
events.description: Implementing blockchain technology to enhance transparency and security in the LIB circular value chain.

events.name: Cloud-based services
events.wd_description: Using cloud-based services for efficient data management and collaboration in the LIB circular value chain.

events.name: Regulation and standardization
events.wd_description: Improving regulation and standardization processes to support sustainable circular value chains for spent LIBs.
events.description: Improving regulation and standardization processes to support sustainable circular value chains for spent LIBs.

events.name: Advantages of LIBs in electric vehicles
events.ta1explanation: LIBs are widely used in electric vehicles due to high energy/power densities, high reliability, and long life.
events.description: LIBs are widely used in electric vehicles due to high energy/power densities, high reliability, and long life.

events.name: Importance of handling end of life LIBs
events.description: Proper handling of retired LIBs, which still have about 70-80% of their initial capacity, is crucial for extending battery life, conserving natural resources, and protecting the environment.

events.name: 5R principle in CVC process
events.description: The 5R principle entails reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose, and recycling in the circular value chain process.

events.name: State of the art remanufacturing technologies
events.description: Discussion on advanced remanufacturing technologies for LIBs.

events.name: Key issues and applications in the repurpose process
events.description: A thorough summary of the key issues and applications in the process of repurposing spent LIBs.

events.name: Comprehensive discussion on the recycling process
events.description: Includes pre-treatments and mainstream recycling technologies from technical, economic, and regulatory perspectives.

events.name: Advanced technologies in the CVC process
events.description: Advanced technologies such as big data, blockchain, and cloud-based services are required to solve issues in the CVC process.

events.name: Regulation and standardization improvement
events.description: Improvement of regulation and standardization processes is necessary for sustainable CVC.
